Scene:
The Laundry
(Kinuta byōshi / 碪拍子)

Play: The Old Tale of Kusunoki (楠昔噺)

Production: April 1971

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))
